name: The Path of the Wanderer
description:
This is my first game and my goal was to put my learnings into Game Maker Studio 2.

It is incomplete due to lack of assets, but one day I finish.

I thank everyone who downloaded and left a comment below, it helps me a lot to keep producing games.

How To Play:

Arrows move the character

A = Jump

S = Attack

D= Dash

I hope you enjoy
